website_summaries.verdict: This is an affordable and well-built curl bar.
pros: This curl bar fits 2-pound plates and has a capacity of 100 pounds
The chrome finish looks great, and 2 weight collars are included
cons: Some customer found the bend placement awkward

website_summaries.verdict: The best budget weight bar with the bar shape to help beginners and intermediate lifters alike.
pros: Curved design of the bar offers a good, solid grip for curling with heavy weights
Surface is coated with a chrome finish and textured grip to offer a more secure hold on the bar as you work out
cons: Experienced users and some novices may find the curved bar design to be uncomfortable or awkward

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not picture or brand specific
customer_reviews.text: For anyone that really needs specific information on this curl bar, once received I noticed it was a different brand from what is advertised. I got a Marcy model # SOC-49. It looks like the Impex brand that is on the picture however the difference is that the locking collars are not spring type they are plastic, seems like it will hold up well since I will use it indoors and dont have to worry about it going bad from sun damage. Still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Will 213

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Wrong curves. Item sent isn't the same as the picture advertised. If you know anything about EZ-bars, you'll know the curves are in the wrong places and at wrong angles putting more pressure on wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K. K.

customer_reviews.title: A recent review - Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews about extreme angles and crappy clamps. I did notice those were mostly older reviews so I thought I would give a review of what I received a week ago. The bar was exactly the shape you would find in any gym. It was well made and balanced. Mine came with SPRING CLAMPS, which is awesome and they work great. My olympic weights arejust slightly loose on the bar but not enough to warrant a complaint. As far aswhat I received, it is a great value for the money and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkzilla

customer_reviews.title: Great Curl bar now I can get super Jacked Arms
customer_reviews.text: Well at least I can try.. but I bought this bar slightly used from Amazon I think it was a return but it came with some wear on it. And it squeaked a little but I took care of that. The bar itself is lightweight about 15lbs and is great for arm workouts. The clamps that come with it work well and all in all this is a good curl bar for the money.
customer_reviews.author: GchanMako

customer_reviews.title: Not same model
customer_reviews.text: Went out on a limb and thought I’d buy this product even though some of the reviews say it’s not the same model. Very disappointed clearly it’s the TBC-51 model and not the model advertised. Save your money and the hassle of the return.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to what some reviews indicated, the angles are great in this ezbar. It is not a deep bend, but a standard ezbar like the bars at all 4 gyms I've belonged to over the years. The clamps work well. The quality is great. I can't believe the price of $35. It's worth $60.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sr

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect! My boyfriend loves it. He was making due with a regular sized bar but with Olympic sized weights. Made a lot of noise. This fits the weights and is super quiet, the weights also stay in place. And it came very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement, inferior product
customer_reviews.text: When you advertise something and send something different, you get 1 star. Especially if its inferior to what you expected. Very dissapointed as an Amazon Prime member. This bate and switch is terrible. Also it rubs silver spray paint off on your hand while you use it, pkus the angles are not even close to standard for an EZ curl bar. If you just need something to curl, sure, try this. But don't be fooled, it's a spray painted marcy product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McCall-Stillman

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Cheap plastic clamps
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. The clamps that come with the bar are useless pieces of junk and the cheapest, most stiff clamps I’ve ever used. Promptly threw them away in exchange for metal ones.
customer_reviews.author: K Grant

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect commercial gym quality with a beautiful finish on it
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect commercial gym quality with a beautiful finish on it. The collars in the picture are not the ones that come with it. The ones that come with it are a very thick and solid plastic with a turning mechanism and are black. They work perfectly and have a nice appearance. I am extremely happy with this purchase. I have no doubt in my mind this bar will last me for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Van Skarsgard

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: First off very impressed with Amazon one day shipping this item. The curl bar is gym quality level. No complaints here except we found some grease or oil probably from the manufacturing process.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Only good for very light use.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as i put 25 lb plates on it it got bent out of shape. Do not purchase this if you plan on doing medium to heavy lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Alcon

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but didn't even last 2 months after home use
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but didn't even last 2 months after home use. Last EZ bar worked for almost 2 years. And I'm not slamming or throwing weights on this hard. Perhaps mine was the bad one in the batch.
customer_reviews.author: allen babauta

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight bar
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight bar. Got this by using Amazon used like new deal. Great savings on a quality weight bar. I use it daily with no complaints. 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Item works perfect with a beautiful chrome finish. Bends are perfect I have zero complaints about the bar.anf the clamps work great as well I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a curl bar.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my home gym
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. 15lb Ez bar for Olympic plates. Came double boxed, which is nice. Came out of the box a little greasy, so be prepared to wipe it down before use. The clips are a little tight when taking off and on, but it does the job and better than the metal spring clips.
customer_reviews.author: Sdk

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: No complaints this bar is just fine and worth the money. The clips are sturdy and the texture is nice. Prefect for a home gym.
customer_reviews.author: J2MC

customer_reviews.title: Solid Olympic Curl Bar. A++
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this bar. I wanted something that could use my Olympic weights, and this was perfect. Very solid in feel and materials. Bonus it also had collars included.
customer_reviews.author: Pete from Cali

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I still use this product today 3 days a week with no problems. most I've loaded on is 120 lbs and works just fine I'm sure you could load more if you could lift it the knurl on it is decent, clamps are easy quick on quick off.
customer_reviews.author: Dman

customer_reviews.title: A good commercial quality bar!
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is, a curl bar. The knurling isn't deep so no shredding of the hands. Nice and solid. The sleeves have a decent spin to them. The bar i received from the order was a Marcy brand and not Impex Apex, but the curves look the same and it seems like commercial gym quality. The reason for the four stars is because I don't care much for the plastic collars. However, I just use regular spring collars and it holds the weights securely. The plastic collars do work fine and secure the weights, just not my preference. I would recommend this bar.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A. Snively

customer_reviews.title: BEST CURL BAR on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this curl bar. I especially like the fact that it came with locking collars. I bought this item before the market seemed to have stop making them and when the price was easily affordable. YAY, Lucky Me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roosevelt Thigpen

customer_reviews.title: Great Curling Bar
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for one of these everywhere and then someone gave me the grand idea to search Amazon and low and behold! Got great quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Marlo

customer_reviews.title: Just like my old gym
customer_reviews.text: Never understood why these bars have been priced as high as they are for the amount of weight most use it for but holds a 45 and 25 on each side without issues and for less than $40. I’m happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Clouse

customer_reviews.title: Read the description, this is a short (curl) bar!
customer_reviews.text: Typical bar, but it's a curl bar. This picture makes it look like a full Olympic bar
customer_reviews.author: Charile Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, the grip arch is not what i would like, its rather flat
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, the grip arch is not what i would like, its rather flat. Feels uncomfortable when held.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great for intended purpose. My wife is weaker than I so she uses just the bar for working out which is like 15 lbs or so.
customer_reviews.author: Kortoga

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bar, very nice grip. Have been using it for around 2 years, and no complaints. Highly recommended for a starter GYM kit
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for bicep curls
customer_reviews.text: The curves are not ideal for bicep curls. I have to use the flat ends of the bar. Bar is better for reverse curl
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bison

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Amazing grip locations. Says 100 pound max on bar but you want reps anyways. Collars spun really good and it’s probably the best curl bar I’ve owned so far. Felt great in the hands and didn’t hurt the wrists
customer_reviews.author: Kody

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose bar
customer_reviews.text: High quality bar, I use it for hip thrusts and the clamps are the end are much better than standard clamps
customer_reviews.author: felicia

customer_reviews.title: ... bends in the bar are not what it looks like in the picture
customer_reviews.text: the bends in the bar are not what it looks like in the picture, they are very slight and not bent enough. going to make due with it though.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Heuston

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised to have received a Marcy brand. ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to have received a Marcy brand. I think they are a little higher quality than most others offered through Amazon. Other than the brand difference, what I received is what's described, and it fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: HIZALL

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Decent size bar and good spring clips. I was buying this for a friend so i was very concerned about quality. He's very happy with it. If you need an Olympic size curl bar for home then I definitely recommend this one. Has spring clips and not the screw or set screw style. Well worth the money and with Prime shipping it's the best price/quality.
customer_reviews.author: warren

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bar works great clips that come with it are sub par at best
customer_reviews.author: amorriso

customer_reviews.title: Alright, but the bends are poorly designed.
customer_reviews.text: The bends are really poorly designed, their placement on the bar is strange and as other reviews have said they are way too subtle. I don't regret this purchase only because the subtle bends and smaller bar size beat using a 7 ft thick strait bar. I appreciate how they included plastic clamps, but the picture provided is misleading. Also the bar is from the brand Marcy not "Impex Apex."
customer_reviews.author: Ibn Nayeem

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This bar is perfect for multi-use. Squats, lunges, hip thrusts, curls, press, shoulders... It's sturdy and the length is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Effarah

customer_reviews.title: This is just fine. It works and does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is just fine. It works and does the job. Why only 3 stars, compared to the ones at the gym they are not as well built. Value, it is great. At this price range I don't know if there is one that's better.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Duldulao

customer_reviews.title: The texture is nice and not too rough on your hands
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job. It does not come with the collars pictured, just simple spring collars. The texture is nice and not too rough on your hands, it is a but uneven though. My bar looked to be offset by about 1/2 and inch. Not a big deal in the least. The bar does feel very solid. The bar itself weighed in at 15.2 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Santoro

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar. Gym Quality and Shape
customer_reviews.text: Very good build quality and similar camber as to what you would find in the gym. I was hesitant to purchase this because many reviews mentioned that it was basically a straight bar however after I received this item (January 21, 2015) I do not know what they were talking about. This bar has a very nice camber to isolate biceps and triceps. Also the model I received has spring clip collars as opposed to the ones pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Using this for bicep curls. Helps alleviate pain I sometimes get in my inner forearm if I use the straight barbell too much.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Had to paint rustoleum so it would t rust. It works great. Be sure to buy weights w a 2” center hole. This bar does weighs about a pound.
customer_reviews.author: John MOY

customer_reviews.title: Needs better balance
customer_reviews.text: Good quality what I don't like is the bends. Seems like the bends were your hands go aren't deep enough or balanced so as you curl the curling bar doesn't want to cooperate with my wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Solid product, smooth rolling ends for Olympic weights. This came with a great set of collars too.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great bar for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great bar for the money! I immediately disassembled the ends of the bar, properly greased and reassembled to tighten to tune it for use. Been perfectly good while using over the last few months.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin F. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great quality .
customer_reviews.text: It’s magnificent barbell. It’s sturdy, comfortable and amazing grasp .
customer_reviews.author: ashkan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Been using it for over a year
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Keiter

customer_reviews.title: great bar for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bar for the money. Angle of bends in the bar could be more but it is satisfactory. Was glad to see that it came with the wire compression clamps rather than the ones pictured.
customer_reviews.author: James Fritz

customer_reviews.title: gym quality
customer_reviews.text: This is just as good as any I have used at the gym
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Clements

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it does what it's suppose to so I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: So here you go the truth. The ends aren't as long as I would have hoped or am use to but it's a curl bar so let's be honest your not going to throw a bunch of weight on there anyway. They move a bit too. The handle grip is deeper cut and is a little more abrasive than preferred. If you were work out gloves not an issue. Otherwise it does what it's suppose to so I'm happy with it. The locks work good and are easy and quick to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Vanklinken

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for home gym enthusiasts! Well constructed and feels solid when working out with weight. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Scho

customer_reviews.title: Good curling bar
customer_reviews.text: This is as advertised. It feels solidly assembled. The clamps are kinda weird to remove for the first time, but they are okay now.
customer_reviews.author: The Tile Guy

customer_reviews.title: Just like I've used in fitness centers for 30 years.
customer_reviews.text: Just like I've used in fitness centers for 30 years. Get in, do your standing curls and skull crushers, get out. No fancy features.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Strong bar
customer_reviews.text: Great with the clips too... needed a small curl bar
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: I love my curl bar
customer_reviews.text: I love my curl bar. It has a great curves and great grips. My curl bar allowed me to work other areas of my body and I feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Big Rob

customer_reviews.title: So far I have comfortably and confidently put 200 lbs on it for bicep ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality bar. Fast shipping. So far I have comfortably and confidently put 200 lbs on it for bicep curls.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Curl Bar and Collars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made bar with plastic collars that I also now use on the straight bar. The curl bar could have a little more bend. But for the price it's a good deal. The collars slide on/off very quickly, so I started using them instead of the spring collars.
customer_reviews.author: benneth01

customer_reviews.title: Ez Bar, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: great addition to our home gym hubby was very pleased (:
customer_reviews.author: akeka

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review
customer_reviews.text: This was a great decision in buying this bar. The price was perfect and I love the grip on it!
customer_reviews.author: DeCamilla Family

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with weight locks
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and really nice that the locks come with the bar a great bonus!!!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this one
customer_reviews.text: Looked over almost all the options amazon had to offer and this was the one. Good grip nice weight and overall quality also like the weight clips
customer_reviews.author: Juan Coronel

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Great curling bar at a cheaper price. Fits my Olympic weights well and the ridges along the bar provide great grip for the clamp. The way is not to far defined that it forces the wrists in awkward positions.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wallace

customer_reviews.title: It's a great little curl bar
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you realize this is an Olympic bar so it holds weights with larger center circles than smaller curl bar weights. It's a great little curl bar. Has plastic clamps to hold weights on the bar. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Js345tn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Light enough to toss around, but sturdy enough to support heavier weights.
customer_reviews.author: P Ruhe

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Negative: The spring clips are ok. Both spring clips fit my bar perfectly. I would've preferred more "curl" to the bar. Positive: Price $30 is great. No nicks/scratches on bar. Bar doesn't feel like it is going to break/bend.
customer_reviews.author: onlyme

customer_reviews.title: Solid bar with great knurling throughout the grip area
customer_reviews.text: Solid bar with great knurling throughout the grip area. the provided clamps hold plates securely. I've seen many different weights listed for this bar, mine weighed in at 15.2lbs. without the collars.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cote

customer_reviews.title: Good Product so far.
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Needed this as my other one keeps making weird noises so had to throw away. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: David  MoralesTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Great bar with good grip
customer_reviews.text: Great bar with good grip. I don’t put anything more than 25ibs on each side and it holds up perfectly with that weight
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price with prime
customer_reviews.text: I did a video review of this bar on youtube: UrviuWGB3r8 Pros: Heavy duty feel Has different collars than pictured and they seem to hold up well (demo in video above). Cons: The bar was lose and doesn't seem to fully tighten down
customer_reviews.author: LiftingDad

customer_reviews.title: Won't be dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Great bar for a great price. Solid construction. Fits the bill and does what I need it to do. Provides the ability for more exercises. Though the bends could be a little more bendy and the clamps that came with it are not as pictured and are constructed of a cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: life

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bar!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was looking for to build my home gym! It’s amazing and looks the same as shown on picture, delivery was on time, can’t complaint
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: The item is sturdy and I'm very glad it came with clips
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very securely. The item is sturdy and I'm very glad it came with clips. The bar has a lot of spin so be wary if you're not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: t.m.

customer_reviews.title: great z bar for the home workouts
customer_reviews.text: great z bar for the home workouts. the bends are pretty shallow, so don't expect too much there and the "threads" at the end can sometimes require some pushing to get the weights on, but at this price, I could deal with those things.
customer_reviews.author: eShopping

customer_reviews.title: Great bar
customer_reviews.text: Good bar for the price. Clips are alright nice little bonus I guess. Just let what I was looking for. I would recommend this bar
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a crap bar. The bends are all wrong. Using this bar is the definition of awkward, and I can't imagine using it with any real weight. Very disappointed. I'm looking into returning it. Not to mention the shipping was slow.
customer_reviews.author: fisheye

customer_reviews.title: Nice bar for the home gym
customer_reviews.text: Nice bar. Feels sturdy and provided collars have been fine, so far. Weights are snug on the bar and don't move around. Great bar for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DN Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bar is awesome. The clamps are a little cheap.
customer_reviews.author: bigdoghorn

customer_reviews.title: Not as good a quality as I had hoped but the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as good a quality as I had hoped but the price was reasonable. It just doesn't fit right in my hands compared to my more expensive brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad bar
customer_reviews.text: This bar came in and it is a decent bar, but it could have a better curl to it, but I was not thrilled with the clips that came with it, because it show collars.
customer_reviews.author: General Lee

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This bar is great. I was at first hesitant, but am glad I purchased it. It will make a perfect addition to my home gym. For those of you worried about not getting the collars. Mine came with collars as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: H.V.

customer_reviews.title: Super quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bar, great grip angles to give your biceps a great workout.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Katz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Stays outside. A little lube every year to make the squeaks go away.
customer_reviews.author: sRobot

customer_reviews.title: Great bar for the price and does exactly what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bar for the price and does exactly what I want it to do. I believe it will hold up very nicely and the locks that come with it seem to be pretty solid as well. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Rawe

customer_reviews.title: bad design for bicep curls, increased pressure on the wrists.
customer_reviews.text: This curl bar puts too much pressure on the wrists when doing bicep curls. Maybe good for tricep curls but for me the bar is too short and the bar design is curved improperly to do basic curls using the hands at the ends of the bar, puts too much pressure on the wrists. Bad design for basic biceps curls.
customer_reviews.author: S. Askegard

customer_reviews.title: I like the bar but the angle of bends in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the bar but the angle of bends in the bar could be better...but I read about that in other reviews and ordered it anyway. For the price it is a good curl bar.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Shaw

customer_reviews.title: High quality, low cost.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to buy this accessory without it costing an arm and a leg. Which is good considering you pretty much need two arms to use it. But honestly it is a great bar for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua G

customer_reviews.title: Good Bar
customer_reviews.text: Good bar. Needs the typical disassemble, clean, and lubricate that everything made from metal needs that comes from China. Clamps are a little snug. They are a bit easier to use with a 7 foot bar I have.
customer_reviews.author: OY!  Ahsscheeks!

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive a Apex bar. Bar is made ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive a Apex bar. Bar is made by Marcy. Knurling is uneven but does not affect use only the quality of the bar. It works for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Golden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Marcy's Olympic curl bar is of very good quality and rivals any commercial gym equipment that I've used!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo A. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Good bar - annoying flaw
customer_reviews.text: So I like this bar by for one flaw - the hex bolts on the end come loose and the bar doesn’t come with any way to tighten them. So until I go buy a tool to re-tighten the ends I can’t safely use the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle VanEtten

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bar. Better than the ones at my gym. Nice that it comes with the locks too.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I don't like how the sides where the weights are spin
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I need it. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I don't like how the sides where the weights are spin. They spin and force myou grip to change
customer_reviews.author: LRM

customer_reviews.title: Knurling was not as aggressive as I'd likem but otherwise a great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Standard curl bar that you'd find in any gym. Knurling was not as aggressive as I'd likem but otherwise a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bar. Broken collar
customer_reviews.text: The bar itself is great, no complaints. Good quality for the price. One of the collars that came with the bar was broken on arrival however. I’d love to have that replaced, otherwise it’s a recommended purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nelly123

customer_reviews.title: Really just a nice little short semi helpful curl bar
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have stated the curves are minimal. Really just a nice little short semi helpful curl bar.
customer_reviews.author: stktrakker

customer_reviews.title: Nice bat, clips are great
customer_reviews.text: Nice bat, clips are great, but knurling is pretty rough. Especially rough since the curl movement takes more turn of the wrist than other exercises.
customer_reviews.author: OU Student

customer_reviews.title: Definitely happy with my purchase for the home gym I've built
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid bar for the price. Definitely happy with my purchase for the home gym I've built. Quick turnover too received it in about 2 days. **It did however come covered in machine oil and the "Olympic clips" are cheap plastic that come covered with rust so I recommend buying your own clips. Overall good bar tho
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice bar and clamps. a little squeaky out of the box. (nothing a little white lithium grease didn't fix.)
customer_reviews.author: Reggie A.

customer_reviews.title: nice bar, I'd recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bar. The bends in the bar are not as much as I would have hoped for but this is a quality bar that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bar
customer_reviews.text: Perfect handles and the weights slide right on. Didn't need any assembling, what more can you ask for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Came with rust over it. Overall, very cheap feeling and looking. Buy nice or buy twice!
customer_reviews.author: Ric Riley

product_meta.title: Marcy Solid Steel Olympic Weight Bar and Weight Plate Collars Chrome-Plated Exercise Weightlifting Bar SOC-49
product_meta.description:
Flex your way to bigger, stronger, and tougher arms with the Marcy Solid Steel Olympic Curl Bar! 

 Made of premium solid steel, this bar will give you a real workout! This equipment is manufactured to precision to be durable and extremely strong yet lightweight, allowing you to carry it wherever you go. Just tuck it into your gym bag and you’ll always be ready to pump some iron. 

 The Marcy Curl Bar is built to isolate and intensify the development of the biceps, triceps, and forearms. It allows you to enhance your body without having to leave the comforts of home. This gym apparatus includes two collars and can hold all 2-inch Olympic weight plates, giving you the edge to perform a series of heavy workouts. 

 Its chrome-plated body not only exudes a simple and bold look, but also provides resistance to corrosion and enhances surface hardness. Additionally, this material is easy to clean, allowing you to wipe off sweat to prevent rust. It has total dimensions of 48 x 4 x 3 inches. 

 Sculpt those Greek-God-like arm muscles with peace of mind, since every purchase of this equipment is backed by a guaranteed 2-year limited warranty. This bar not only enhances your arm muscles, it also increases your arm power and control. Just complete a set of muscle-building exercises with this equipment and watch as your body progresses effectively. Experience optimum body gains the right way with the Marcy Pro Fitness Curl Bar!
feature_bullets: HIGH-QUALITY DESIGN – This curl bar is made from sturdy, reliable, and durable steel and manufactured with precision to ensure high tensile strength. This lifting bar is guaranteed to stand the test of time
CHROME-PLATED FINISH – The chrome-plated body is non-toxic and corrosion-resistant. Its surface is coated for enhanced durability. The body’s finish is sleek, ergonomic, and easy to clean

DESIGNED TO DEVELOP ARM MUSCLES – This curl bar is constructed to target and enhance your arm muscles when you perform exercises to boost your biceps, triceps, and forearms. This gym equipment also enhances arm strength, power, and control
TWO WEIGHT PLATE COLLARS – This set includes two weight plate collars that help to secure the weight plates on the bar for the safety while you perform a variety of intense workout

EXTREMELY STRONG – This bar is built to hold 2-inch Olympic weight plates without breaking or collapsing. This curl bar secures the weight plates effectively giving you a hassle-free workout experience
